abstract: Edson Buddle may be largely out of sight in Germany's second division, but he is doing his best to make sure he isn't out of mind.
snippet: Edson Buddle may be largely out of sight in Germany's second division, but he is doing his best to make sure he isn't out of mind.
lead_paragraph: Edson Buddle may be largely out of sight in Germany's second division, but he is doing his best to make sure he isn't out of mind as the United States national team continues to search for goal scorers.

headline.main: Buddle Scores Twice, Keeping His Name in the Mix
